name: Personal Data Breach
description: Unauthorized access or disclosure of personal data

name: Consent Withdrawal
description: Data principal withdraws consent for processing

name: Grievance Raised
description: Data principal raises grievance against fiduciary

name: Data Access Request
description: Data principal requests access to personal data

name: Erasure Request
description: Data principal requests erasure of personal data

name: Correction Request
description: Data principal requests correction of inaccurate data

name: Authority Inquiry
description: DPDPA Authority initiates investigation or inquiry

name: Data Transfer
description: Transfer of personal data to third party

name: Compliance Audit
description: Audit of compliance with DPDPA obligations
